column5: Can you pm me and let me know if you still want to get rid of the wieght machine or not? If you do, I will come and get it this week.  Thanks Rob aka speedtroll

Sorry Bud Its still yours and it is not going anywhere. Sorry havent got back to you just been having some family health issues and things got real bad on Thursday, so I have really been tied up. I will shoot u a PM this week Robin
